definition.text: This indicator plots a trend line, trend direction, and trend colored candles based on the price action exceeding the Average True Range threshold once applied to the EMA.

paragraphs.text: The plotted candles are colored based on the calculated trend direction, rather than the price action for each time period. Turquoise represents an uptrend, Pink for a downtrend, and Grey when ranging.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| KeltnerBaseline | KeltBl | value, trend, max, min, open, close |
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Keltner Baseline" Procedure Loop.
